query.name: Plants
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT PlantID, Plant FROM PlantLayout

query.name: Departments
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT DepartmentID, Department FROM PlantLayout WHERE PlantID=?

query.name: Zones
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ZoneID, Zone FROM PlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=?

query.name: WorkCells
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT WorkCellID, WorkCell FROM PlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=?

query.name: Machines
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MachineID, Machine FROM PlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=? AND ZoneID=?

query.name: Subsystems
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT PartID, Part FROM PlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=? AND ZoneID=? AND MachineID=?

query.name: Auditors
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, AuditorName FROM Auditor

query.name: Supervisors
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, SupervisorName FROM Supervisor

query.name: AccidentTypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, AccidentType FROM AccidentTypes

query.name: InjuryTypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, InjuryType FROM InjuryTypes

query.name: BodyParts
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, BodyPart FROM BodyParts

query.name: Tools
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MoldNo, MoldID FROM MoldIDs

query.name: RootCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RCID, RootCause FROM vRootCause

query.name: SecondaryCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SRCID, SecondaryRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=?

query.name: MicroCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MRCID, MicroRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

query.name: Actions
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ActionID, Action FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

query.name: EWORootCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RCID, RootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause

query.name: EWOSecondaryCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SRCID, SecondaryRootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RCID=?

query.name: EWOActions
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ActionID, Action FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

query.name: CloseIssue
query.qstring: INSERT INTO ClosedIssues (FormName, FormNum, LineNum, ActionTaken) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: OpenIssue
query.qstring: DELETE FROM ClosedIssues WHERE FormName=? AND FormNum=? AND LineNum=?

query.name: GetOpenIssues
query.qstring: SELECT * FROM OpenIssues

query.name: GetClosedIssues
query.qstring: SELECT * FROM ClosedIssueDetails

query.name: UATypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT UATID, UAType FROM vUATypes

query.name: UAMicroTypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT UAMTID, UAMicroType FROM vUATypes WHERE UATID=?

query.name: MachMTBF
query.qstring: EXEC pMachMTBF @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: MachMTTR
query.qstring: EXEC pMachMTTR @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: MachDowntime
query.qstring: EXEC pMachDowntime @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: MachScrap
query.qstring: EXEC pMachScrap @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: MoldOEE
query.qstring: EXEC pMoldOEE @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: MachOEE
query.qstring: EXEC pMachOEE @startDate=?, @endDate=?

query.name: PMDue
query.qstring: SELECT * FROM HoursToNextPM

query.name: AuditsPerAuditor
query.qstring: SELECT AuditorName, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM WCC GROUP BY AuditorName ORDER BY Audits DESC

query.name: AuditsPerWorkCell
query.qstring: SELECT WorkCell, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM WCC GROUP BY WorkCell ORDER BY Audits DESC

query.name: AuditsPerZone
query.qstring: SELECT Department + ' ' + Zone AS DeptZone, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM WCC GROUP BY Department, Zone ORDER BY Audits DESC

query.name: AgingReport
query.qstring: SELECT Name + '#' + CAST(ID AS varchar(max)) + ' Line:' + CAST(LineNum AS varchar(max)) AS Issue, DaysOpen FROM OpenIssues WHERE DaysOpen>0 ORDER By DaysOpen

query.name: SeverityReport
query.qstring: SELECT Severity, COUNT(*) AS [Open] FROM OpenIssues GROUP BY Severity

query.name: ZonesNotAudited
query.qstring: SELECT Zone FROM Zones WHERE Zone NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT Zone FROM WCC)

query.name: WorkCellsNotAudited
query.qstring: SELECT WorkCell FROM WorkCells WHERE WorkCell NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT WorkCell FROM WCC)

query.name: AuditorsWithoutAudits
query.qstring: SELECT AuditorName FROM Auditor WHERE AuditorName NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName FROM WCC)

query.name: OilPerPress
query.qstring: SELECT Press, SUM(Qty) AS OilQty FROM ODL GROUP BY Press ORDER BY OilQty
